html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-02162020-04-03,  ,  , 
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Grain Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA GRAIN REGULATIONS in order to (1) update the Canada Grain Regulations to align with the amendments to the Canada Grain Act contained in the Act to implement Canada-United States-Mexico Agreement; (2) ensure that the CGC can continue to meet its mandate ‘to ensure a dependable commodity for domestic and export markets’; and (3) improve consistency of language between English and French text.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0063 Publication Date: 2020-04-29
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Canada Grain Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADA GRAIN REGULATIONS in order to (1) update the Canada Grain Regulations to align with the amendments to the Canada Grain Act contained in the Act to implement Canada-United States-Mexico Agreement; (2) ensure that the CGC can continue to meet its mandate ‘to ensure a dependable commodity for domestic and export markets’; and (3) improve consistency of language between English and French text.
